mapper.select: select userId,userName,to_char(birth,'YYY-MM-DD') birth, phone, email, emailReception, smsReception, nickName, zipCode, address1, address2, addTel, memberGrade from users where userId=#{userId} and userPwd=#{userPwd}
mapper.insert: insert into point(userId, savingDate, expirationDate,value,pointItem,pointId) values(#{userId}, sysdate, sysdate+30,1000,#{pointItem},#{pointId})
mapper.select: select userId from users where userName=#{userName} and to_char(birth,'YYYY-MM-DD')=#{birth} and phone=#{phone} and email=#{email}
select * from users where userId=#{userId} and userName=#{userName} and to_char(birth,'YYYY-MM-DD')=#{birth} and phone=#{phone} and email=#{email}
mapper.update: update users set userPwd=#{userPwd} where userId=#{userId}
